mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, NICKNAME, MEMBER_TEL, MEMBER_EMAIL, SIGNUP_DATE, LAST_ACCESS_DATE, GENDER FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID IS NOT NULL ORDER BY MEMBER_NO
SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, NICKNAME, MEMBER_TEL, MEMBER_EMAIL, SIGNUP_DATE, LAST_ACCESS_DATE, GENDER FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{member_no}
mapper.update: update member set member_id = null, member_pw = null, nickname = null, member_tel = null, member_email = null, signup_date = null, last_access_date = null, gender = null where member_no = #{member_no}
mapper.select: SELECT P.PAY_NO, P.PAY_DATE, C.CODE_VALUE FROM PAY P, COMMON C WHERE P.TICKET_CODE = C.CODE AND MEMBER_NO=#{member_no}
SELECT R.REVIEW_NO, R.CONTENTS, R.BOOK_NO, R.REVIEW_DATE, R.MEMBER_NO, B.TITLE FROM REVIEW R, BOOKS B WHERE R.MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO(+) AND R.MEMBER_NO =#{member_no} ORDER BY REVIEW_NO

select c.code_value, sum(case when gender = 'male' then 1 else 0 end) as "male", sum(case when gender = 'female' then 1 else 0 end) as "female" from( select t.*, m.gender from ticket t, pay p, member m where p.member_no=m.member_no and p.ticket_code= p.ticket_code) t, common c where t.ticket_code(+) = c.code and common_code='0G' group by c.code_value
